item.title: 每日星座运势：2024 年 12 月 31 日
item.description: 占星师，今天你的星座运势如何？ 文章每日星座运势：2024 年 12 月 31 日首次出现在VICE上。

item.title: 继《Astro Bot》成功之后，索尼或考虑重启旧版 PlayStation IP
item.description: 尽管《Astro Bot》是一款近乎游戏杰作的作品，但它是对 PlayStation 30 年历史的衷心致敬。它宣传了自 1996 年以来从未见过的现代特许经营权和 IP，清楚地表明人们仍然对索尼的标志性目录充满热爱。今年早些时候，索尼领导层声称原创 IP 不够。索尼的 Studio […] 文章继《Astro Bot》成功之后，索尼可能会考虑恢复旧的 Playstation IP首先出现在VICE上。

item.title: 为 LG（已停产）蓝光播放器倾注一杯
item.description: 据 FlatpanelsHD 上周晚些时候报道，LG 将永久停止其蓝光播放器业务，您只需浏览 LG 网站上搜索“蓝光”一词的 174 个结果，即可亲眼看到这一点。在每个产品页面的右上角，您会看到“停产”字样。蓝光 […] 文章为 LG（现已停产）蓝光播放器倾注一滴首先出现在VICE上。

item.title: 您是否应该尝试一下 Apple Card 的最新奖励优惠？
item.description: 甜蜜的苹果还是毒药？Apple Card，又名苹果信用卡，正在开展一项促销活动，截至 1 月 13 日，如果您在开户后的前 60 天内消费超过一定限额，您将获得 100 美元或 300 美元的类似现金的东西（更多信息见下文）。听起来很熟悉？苹果 […] 文章您应该尝试一下 Apple Card 的最新奖励优惠吗？首先出现在VICE上。

item.title: 塞思·费兰蒂的歌谣，警察就是不放过他
item.description: 塞思·费兰蒂称自己为“非法电影制作人”。因此，他因卡车中藏有 400 多磅大麻而被捕也许并不奇怪。“他们仍然表现得好像大麻战争正处于顶峰时期，”他惊呼道。“什么时候才会停止？”塞思有着悠久的历史[......] 文章塞思·费兰蒂的歌谣，警察就是不放过他首先出现在VICE上。

item.title: 我以前对 VR 不屑一顾，但现在我的看法改变了
item.description: 这听起来可能有点傻，但很长一段时间以来，我都讨厌虚拟现实，因为它被宣传为“将取代游戏机的东西”。极力反对改变是人类的天性。当时，虚拟现实只是一个松散的野心，大多数时候都运行得很糟糕。大型 AAA 发行商和开发商不会触及[…] 帖子我曾经对虚拟现实嗤之以鼻——现在，我想我的态度正在改变首先出现在VICE上。

item.title: 你仍然可以买到 Turnover 售罄的 Peripheral Vision 巡演门票
item.description: 本月早些时候，当 Turnover 宣布他们将开始 2025 年巡演以庆祝其开创性/标志性/流派融合/等专辑“Peripheral Vision”十周年时，另类独立摇滚乐手（包括我们自己的某些员工）欢呼雀跃。 （这只是带有混响的流行朋克，我改变了主意。）这支弗吉尼亚乐队只宣布了乐队将[…]的六个日期 文章您仍然可以买到 Turnover 售罄的 Peripheral Vision 巡演门票首先出现在VICE上。

item.title: 《俄罗斯方块效应》：音乐与运动
item.description: 市面上从不缺少俄罗斯方块。很长一段时间以来，俄罗斯方块 99 都是我最喜欢的版本。它让我沉迷了好几个月。我的最高成绩是第二名，唯一一次失利是因为我的手指滑了一下。但是，俄罗斯方块效应以一种我从未预料到的方式重新连接了我的大脑。我毫不掩饰我的[…] 文章“俄罗斯方块效应”：音乐与运动首先出现在VICE上。

item.title: 《空洞骑士：丝之歌》将在准备就绪时发布，我对此表示满意
item.description: 我们快到 2024 年年底了。自从 Team Cherry 宣布《空洞骑士：丝之歌》已经过去五年了，每个人心中都有一个问题：“它到底在哪里？”在过去三年里，丝之歌的出现已经成为每场游戏活动上的一个笑话。Team Cherry 一直以 […] 而臭名昭著。 文章《空洞骑士：丝之歌》将在准备就绪时准备就绪，我喜欢这一点首先出现在VICE上。

item.title: “寿司本”给我们又一个理由去寿镇，预告支线任务更新
item.description: 即使玩过很多其他 VR 体验，《寿司本》仍然在我最推荐的游戏名单中名列前茅。精美的艺术风格、古怪的对话和无可挑剔的氛围非常适合在岛上漫步或玩转故事模式。值得庆幸的是，对于那些已经完成所有内容的人来说，[…] 文章“寿司本”给了我们另一个参观 Kotobuki 镇的理由，预告支线任务更新首先出现在VICE上。

item.title: Following ‘Astro Bot’s Success, Sony May Look Into Reviving Older Playstation IPs
item.description: Despite being a near-gaming masterpiece, Astro Bot is a heartfelt homage to 30 years of PlayStation history. Drumming up modern franchises and IPs not seen since 1996, it clearly shows that there’s still a lot of love for Sony’s iconic catalog. Earlier this year, Sony leadership claimed not to have enough original IP. Sony’s Studio […] The post Following ‘Astro Bot’s Success, Sony May Look Into Reviving Older Playstation IPs appeared first on VICE.

item.title: Pour One Out for LG’s (Now Discontinued) Blu-ray Players
item.description: LG is snipping the power cord off its Blu-ray player business for good, as FlatpanelsHD reported late last week, and which you can see for yourself just by perusing LG’s 174 results when you search its website for the term “Blu-ray.” In the upper right-hand corner of each product page, you’ll see “discontinued” plastered. item.title: The Ballad of Seth Ferranti, Who the Cops Just Won’t Leave Alone
item.description: Seth Ferranti calls himself “the Outlaw Filmmaker.” So it’s perhaps no surprise that he just got arrested with more than 400 lbs of cannabis in his truck. “They’re still acting like it’s the height of the ‘War On Drugs‘ years with marijuana,” he exclaims. “When is it going to stop?” Seth has a big history […] The post The Ballad of Seth Ferranti, Who the Cops Just Won’t Leave Alone appeared first on VICE.

item.title: I Used To Turn My Nose up at VR — Now, I Think My Tune Is Changing
item.description: This might sound silly, but for the longest time, I hated VR because it was billed as “the thing that would replace consoles.” It’s human nature to be aggressively averse to change. Back then, VR was only a loose ambition that functioned horrifically most of the time. Big-time AAA publishers and developers wouldn’t touch the […] The post I Used To Turn My Nose up at VR — Now, I Think My Tune Is Changing appeared first on VICE.

item.title: You Can Still Get Tickets to Turnover’s Sold-Out Peripheral Vision Tour
item.description: Alt-indie-emo-whatever-rockers (including certain members of our own staff) rejoiced earlier this month when Turnover announced they would be embarking on a 2025 tour in celebration of the ten-year anniversary of their seminal/iconic/genre-bending/etc. album “Peripheral Vision.” (It’s just pop-punk with reverb, change my mind.) item.title: ‘Tetris Effect’: Music and Movement
item.description: There’s no shortage of Tetris out there. Tetris 99, for a long time, was my favorite version. It kept me locked in for months. My highest finish was second place, and I only lost that one because my finger slipped. But, Tetris Effect rewired my brain in a way I never expected. I’ve made no secret of my […] The post ‘Tetris Effect’: Music and Movement appeared first on VICE.

item.title: ‘Hollow Knight: Silksong’ Will Be Ready When It’s Ready, and I Like That
item.description: We’re almost at the end of 2024. It’s been five years since Team Cherry announced Hollow Knight: Silksong, and one question has been on everyone’s minds: “Where the hell is it?” A Silksong appearance has become a running joke at every gaming event for what seems like the last three years. Team Cherry has been notoriously […] The post ‘Hollow Knight: Silksong’ Will Be Ready When It’s Ready, and I Like That appeared first on VICE.

item.title: ‘Sushi Ben’ Gives Us Yet Another Reason To Visit Kotobuki Town, Teasing Side Quest Update
item.description: Even after playing through plenty of other VR experiences, Sushi Ben sits high on the list of my most recommended. The beautiful art style, quirky dialogue, and impeccable vibes are great for a stroll around the island or a romp through its story mode.
